```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(mediumstats)
```


```{r rss}
filename <- '../data/temp.xml'
download_feed(destfile = filename)
nodeSet <- get_blogs_set(source = filename)

# Build data frame
df <- blogs_set_as_df(nodeSet)

print(df)
```

```{r stats}
mes <- get_mes_stats('../data/mes.csv') # With Medium enhanced stats
msg <- get_msg_stats('../data/msg.csv') # With Medium stats grabber
```

```{r merge-mes}
merge(df, mes, by = 'id', all = TRUE)
```
```{r merge-msg}
merge(df, msg, by = 'id', all = TRUE)
```
